description:
Foreshore/Views
Absolute front row that can never be built out. To say this property is a rarity is an understatement. Held in the same family since new this is your opportunity to secure an exclusive location so coveted by all. With nothing in front of you the northerly views stretch from the Cowes foreshore across the water to the sparkling evening lights of Somers and Flinders to Stoney Point and French Island. Enjoy direct beach access and the privacy this fabulous location offer.
The existing 3 bedroom beach house is zoned for the parents at one end and kids at the other. Two separate lounges PBE with open fire place, central kitchen and casual out door living drinking in that amazing water view.
Only minutes to Cowes, the boat ramp streets away, world class surf beaches and all that Philip Island has to offer. Set on 442m2 our owner had stunning bespoke plans done for a new two story residence that they are happy to provide to the new owner.

BRAND NEW FOUR BEDROOM HOME
Located in one of Phillip islands best estates Shearwater Estate just a short stroll to the Golf Course and Silverleave's Beach.
Approximately 490m2 the allotment is fully landscaped and fenced all you need to do is relax and enjoy your time here.
This new 4 bedroom home has been constructed by one of Melbourne's leading and most reputable builders. As you walk into this home you will instantly feel the abundance of space and the light, bright open feel resulting from the full northerly aspects of the kitchen, dining and main living area.
The spacious master bedroom is designed with a full walk in wardrobe and ensuite. The additional 3 large bedrooms gives you plenty of room for your family and friends.
In addition, the home provides a separate living zone which can be used as a living/ rumpus or entertainment room.
The open plan living space adjoins the large kitchen with stone bench tops and a 900mm stainless steel oven and cook top with a spacious walk in pantry. All of this opens up to a rear fully covered rear alfresco.
Call Alex Scott and staff today to arrange your inspection or find out about our next open for inspection.

BEAUTY IN THE BAY!
Peacefully positioned in a quiet cul-de-sac stands this modernised four-bedroom residence, showcasing a functional floorplan and contemporary finishes throughout.
Set over two levels, boasting four bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, two spacious living areas, open plan kitchen and dining complete with Tasmanian oak timber floors, an island bench and breakfast bar, this stunning home is ideal for permanent living or a fantastic holiday house.
Other features include split system heating and cooling, carpet to the bedrooms and living zones, down lights throughout and internal access from the double garage.
Outside you will find a large north facing outdoor deck area with views of the spacious yet easily maintained backyard and a garden shed.
This beautiful home on 989m2 approx. is conveniently situated just a short stroll from Red Rocks Beach and to the main street of Cowes. It's sure to impress!
Book an inspection today with Beth Lynch.

LOCATION LOCATION
A massive 1270m2 in the centre of town, Double storey 3 bedroom home with a big bungalow you can enjoy now while you make plans for the future.
Property next door for sale also, so many options here. Inspections by appointment - Offers invited.

STAGE 11 – NOW AVALIABLE
STAGE 11 – NOW AVALIABLE
The time has come and the wait if is over stage 11 has arrived.
Due to title mid 2019 you can secure your allotment with a 10% deposit and plan your new home or invest in land.
These allotments offer all available services connected such as NBN, underground power, sewage, Mains water & Recycled water.
With frontage starting at 14m up to 18m with completed cross over all you have to worry about is building your dream home.
Call Alex Scott Cowes now as these allotments won't be around for long 5952 2633

Your Forever Home Awaits
A luxurious lifestyle awaits in this stunning quality home. Built with families in mind a functional floor plan provides privacy and entertaining areas giving space for the whole family.
Highlighted by the dramatic use of voids and the expansive use of glass, every detail and aspect of the contemporary design has been crafted for functionality. A state-of-the-art South Coast Kitchen has been custom made to perfection and overlooks the casual living and dining space. The formal lounge room is bright and airy making entertaining a delight. Your master suite is privately located away from the further 3 spacious bedrooms and there’s a generous study or 5th bedroom to use as you need. A large entertainment room plus another 2 living spaces makes this home generously proportioned.
So many extras include a separate studio, perfect for hobbies or teenager accommodation. Expansive storage spaces and a large double garage with internal access, boat and caravan spaces makes this a brilliant permanent or holiday residence.
All situated in a beautiful court location surrounded by similar calibre homes, 5 minute walk to the beach. Too much more to mention this home represents outstanding value.
Don’t delay inspect today.
Call Vincent and Sandra today for your free no obligation market appraisal on (03) 5678 8506

address: Villa 123/2128 Phillip Island Road Cowes VIC 3922
description:
LIFESTYLE OPPORTUNITY
An affordable investment opportunity, within the beautiful Ramada Resort located on pristine Phillip Island.
An easy 1.5 hour drive from Melbourne. It consists of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (1 en-suite), and a bright and sunny open plan living, dining and kitchen.
This investment opportunity within the Resort will appeal to corporate couples, singles or families looking for a luxurious, relaxing, maintenance free getaway.
The resort offers a cafe/bar, indoor gym, games room and walking trails full of wildlife. Come and take a look and you will not be disappointed.
All of this is within a 10 minute drive to Cowes CBD, beautiful bay beaches and famous surf beaches.

Lovely Unit, Central Cowes Location
Situated in a sought after central Cowes location, this low maintenance brick veneer unit comprises of a spacious sunken living, separate kitchen/ dining complemented by stainless steel appliances, two bedrooms with built in robes and one bathroom. The kitchen dining extends onto an undercover deck that overlooks the lovely rear garden.
Additional features include split system heating/cooling and attached single garage. No need for the car as the unit is only a 200m flat walk to supermarket, shops and Cowes Beach.
Ideally suited for investment, holiday or permanent living.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Phillip Island.

Extremely Rare
A very limited opportunity awaits, as vacant land inn this position is very rare. Build your dream home in this very quiet and secluded area. With the north facing aspect a huge draw card that cannot be replaced. a very easy walk to cowes beach is just another quality feature.

LOOKING FOR SOMETHING DIFFERENT?
If you’re looking for something different you can't go past this superbly located property, only a short walk to the beach and main street; yet upon entering the gate you are greeted with the feeling of quiet seclusion.
Featuring private established gardens and north facing courtyard it has three bedrooms including loft style master bedroom with it's own ensuite.
Light filled generous open living spaces, soaring ceilings and white shutters throughout give the property warmth and charm. Plus a convenient second bathroom and good sized garage completes the perfect package.
Inspection is a must.

RESORT STYLE LIVING
This modern townhouse is tucked securely in a gated community only 200 meters (approx..) from Cowes beach. With a clever layout providing space for the whole family it consists of three bedrooms, two bathrooms, two generous living spaces, double garage and a rear courtyard.
Enjoy this beach side resort lifestyle; entertaining by the pool and BBQ facilities or take a short walk along the foreshore to the central hub of Cowes cafes, restaurants and retail outlets.
Currently operated as a holiday rental there is opportunity to reap the rewards of extra income or your own ideal getaway.

FIRST CLASS HOLIDAY HAVEN
Boasting four spacious bedrooms, the master with ensuite and relaxed light filled spaces, this home exudes a classic coastal feel.
Nestled beautifully on a 667m2 block (approx.), this wonderful home is positioned a short stroll to the Anderson Road boat ramp, and local Anderson Road Café. All amenities are within easy reach being only a short walk to the beach, jetty, restaurants & cafes, boutique shops and local primary schools of central Cowes.
The generous open plan kitchen, living and dining spaces offer seamless access to the huge deck that is ideal for entertaining or relaxing with the family. With contemporary fixtures and fittings and the comfort of split system heating and cooling throughout plus a single carport there is nothing to do but move in and enjoy. There is an outdoor shower with hot and cold water to rinse off after being at the nearby beach.
Stepping into this well styled home evokes a feeling of picture perfect living – come and make it part of your everyday.

STYLISH, SCENIC & SPACIOUS
This perfect modern property is located on a prime corner allotment and only footsteps to the Cowes boat ramp, cafe and beautiful beach.
Newly extended and updated this home boasts an open plan kitchen with stone bench tops and plenty of storage all complemented by durable modern flooring.
Upstairs, take a step into the flawless living room and fall in love with the stunning bay views! There is also a fully decked out bar area, ideal for entertaining and enjoying the views from all angles. The master bedroom is sure to impress with a walk in wardrobe and new ensuite.
Downstairs, there are three spacious bedrooms, one bathroom and convenient European laundry. Being fully fenced, with secure garage, low maintenance landscaping, dual driveway access, undercover boat storage and split systems throughout this property is the complete package.
In such a great location there is endless potential; holiday heaven or the ultimate in living your dream coastal lifestyle.

Going...Going...
If you’re looking for an entry level home then we have the perfect property for you. This compact little beauty is suited to young families, holiday makers, renovators and first home buyers looking for a retreat where you can enjoy the peace and quiet of island living or a tradesman wanting a weekend project with plenty of scope for improvement and extension (STCA). Consisting of two bedrooms, functional kitchen and adjoining meals and living room with separate bathroom and toilet.
All situated on a near flat block of approximately 603sqm, fencing in good condition, and single lock-up garage. Easy to maintain and just a 2 minute drive to the beautiful Red Rocks beach and 5 minutes to Main St, Cowes.
This little gem won’t last long, so be quick to inspect.
For your free no obligation market appraisal call Vincent and Sandra 03 5678 8506

Stepping up in Style!!
Situated in the increasingly popular WhyteSands estate is this beautifully presented single level modern family home.
Offering spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area complete with highlight windows allowing for year round natural light and raked ceilings, three bedrooms and one bathroom.
Additional features include stunning polished concrete floors throughout, double glazed windows, double garage with internal access, combustion heating, split system heating and cooling with the kitchen complimented by cypress pine bench tops and shelving along with 900 upright stainless steel gas cooktop and electric oven. The main bathroom also has a cypress pine bench top and stunning floor to ceiling tiles.
All set within a 556 sqm approx fully fenced corner allotment with lovely landscaped established surrounds that includes a fire pit and rear access, ideal for boat/caravan accommodation. Located opposite the family friendly park with a BBQ area and Basketball Court.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Perfectly Positioned!
Perfectly positioned in the heart of Cowes, only 100 metres approx to the beach, shops and cafés, is this beautifully appointed, spacious apartment located on the second floor within the Phillip Island Apartments complex.
Enter into the lovely light filled open plan kitchen, living and dining space, featuring polished timber floors, which flows out through large floor to ceiling glass sliding doors on to a generous sized balcony overlooking the pool and garden; perfect to sit back and just relax!
The two spacious bedrooms are carpeted and both have built in robes; the master bedroom boasts a lovely view overlooking the pool area. The dual access bathroom area includes a separate shower, separate toilet, bath with shower over and laundry.
The apartment is being offered fully furnished and is currently managed by Phillip Island Apartments - one can make use of the apartment occasionally while still receiving an income. Or choose to have this wonderful apartment solely for your own use.
Fabulous surf and bay beaches, wineries, Grand Prix track, penguins and all that the Island has to offer are only minutes away.
Don't miss this investment opportunity that gives you a great location for your holidays!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

A Wonderful Quality Of Life!
Awaiting its new owner is this immaculate, free flowing and modern single level family home located in the popular Shearwater Estate.
Showcasing its design, this residence comprises three bedrooms, two bathrooms, formal dining room (which could be converted into a fourth bedroom or third living area), study/home office and two spacious living zones.
The master bedroom is complete with a full ensuite and his/her walk in robes.
The home offers a central and light filled open plan living area with a beautiful eye catching 'Artemis' ceiling fan to compliment the modern day lifestyle.
With a host of additional features including two split system heating and cooling units, tiled floors and carpet throughout, high ceilings, 900m stainless steel gas cooktop and electric oven, stone benchtops to the kitchen, private and North facing undercover alfresco area, sun drenched rear deck, garden shed, double garage with internal access and a separate space for caravan/boat accommodation. This home also has the potential to be sold fully furnished!
All of this is set within a 667sqm approx. fully fenced allotment with lovely, low maintenance landscaped surrounds and within a short stroll to the Cowes Golf Course, Beach and shopping precinct, this is the perfect way to enjoy the Island lifestyle.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

CENTRAL COWES CLASSIC
This very spacious, three bedroom brick home is located in a central location, walking distance to the main street of Cowes, supermarkets, restaurants, cafes and primary school and only a 10 minute walk to the Cowes foreshore with its North facing beaches. With room for the whole family, this is a great buy.
The home comprises of three spacious bedrooms, all with built in robes, large living area with split system air conditioning, separate dining area with feature wood fireplace and kitchen area with plenty of storage space and electric wall oven, bathroom with bath and separate toilet as well as a separate laundry.
The added bonus of this property is the rear bungalow with a bedroom and living space plus undercover BBQ area and a separate bathroom with shower and toilet.
Other features include single carport, east facing verandah and fully fenced back yard. Enquire today to avoid disappointment.

ORIGINAL ISLAND HOME PRICED TO SELL
First time offered in half a century, a true piece of history.
This home has been designed and built with quality craftsmanship rarely seen these days. Constructed when Phillip Island was truly an island escape.
Built to last this very affordable home is in great condition and an ideal canvas to design your permanent or holiday home.
Offering open plan living, kitchen and dining plus a wrap around deck overlooking the front north facing yard.
Additional features include 3 large bedrooms, spacious living and under cover parking perfect for storing your boat or trailer.
Set on approximately 585m2 close to Cowes beach and some of the islands best coffee shops and restaurants.
Call Alex Scott Cowes today to arrange your inspection or find out about our opens 5952 2633

STYLISH FAMILY OR HOLIDAY HOME PRICED TO SELL
Stylish and contemporary double storey family home is in a prime location, only minutes' walk to the Cowes main street and a short stroll to the North facing Cowes beach.
The lower level offers three generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes, main bathroom and laundry and the second living room opening onto the rear undercover deck.
The First floor comprises a light spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area that opens onto the covered deck area perfect for entertaining you're guests.
The kitchen is complete with modern inclusion of stainless steel cooking appliances such as 900mm cooktop and electric oven, dishwasher, Tiled splashback and plenty of storage.
The Master Bedroom is located on the first floor complete with walk in robe and private ensuite.
Features include two split system heating and cooling units, double glazed windows, double garage with storage and internal access to the home.

PRIVATE OASIS
Spread over a single level, this home has been designed to complement the relaxed island lifestyle and permanent living. This stylish home includes 3 large bedrooms with a shared bathroom and a stunning master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, spacious dual living areas and outdoor entertaining areas including an additional decking area off the low maintenance garden to catch the afternoon sun! The spacious kitchen & living is well appointed with stainless steel appliances, generous bench space, plenty of storage and extends through to the double sliding doors to the outdoor decking with separate BBQ areas.
Additional features of the property include a double carport, under house storage, 2 split systems, clear run perfect to store a boat or jetski, separate laundry and garden shed.
Located in a quiet court, this property is within walking distance to local parks and children's’ playground and only a short distance from beautiful beaches, natural attractions, cafes and restaurants. This immaculate home embraces the essence of a tranquil coastal lifestyle.
Arrange your private inspection today.
